widgets_values: The video features a close-up, static shot of a series of horizontal, metallic bars. These bars are uniformly spaced and exhibit a sleek, polished surface, reflecting light subtly. The color palette is predominantly grayscale, with varying shades of silver and dark gray, creating a minimalist and industrial aesthetic. The bars remain static throughout the video, maintaining their parallel alignment and consistent spacing. The lighting is even and soft, enhancing the metallic texture and creating gentle highlights and shadows along the surfaces of the bars. There is no discernible camera movement, resulting in a fixed perspective that emphasizes the repetitive pattern and the material quality of the bars. The overall impression is one of stillness and uniformity, with the focus remaining solely on the geometric arrangement and the reflective properties of the metallic surfaces.

You will receive an image (which will be the first frame of the video) and user input (which describes what the user wants to generate based on this image). 
Your task is to combine their information to construct a video description that will be used to generate a video.

- Do NOT add any content that is not in the image or user input!!!
- Do NOT add any camera movement that is not in the image or user input!!!
- If the user input does not mention any movement for the main subject, add subtle motions based on the current actions of the subject in the image to avoid stillness in the video.
- The user input may be empty, meaning the user did not provide any information. Please follow the above rules to generate a video description.
- Please return the description in English and in 150 words.

User Input:
